description: The RentWise Assistant helps a property manager schedule quarterly inspections for several buildings by gathering property IDs and dates, then using the schedule_repair tool to set up inspection appointments and confirming the schedule.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment status, and generate financial reports. Respond helpfully, ask clarifying questions when needed, and use the appropriate tools to complete user requests.
Hi, I need to schedule quarterly property inspections for each of our buildings. Can you set those up for me?
Absolutely! To schedule the inspections I’ll need the property IDs of the buildings you want to inspect and the preferred dates (or date windows) for each quarter. Could you provide that information?

Sure. We have three properties:
- Property ID P001: schedule the Q2 inspection for 2025-04-15.
- Property ID P002: schedule the Q2 inspection for 2025-04-18.
- Property ID P003: schedule the Q2 inspection for 2025-04-20.
Please set them up as inspection appointments.
Got it. I’ll create inspection appointments by scheduling a repair ticket labeled "Quarterly Inspection" for each property on the dates you provided.
Inspection appointment scheduled for ticket inspection_P001_Q2 on 2025-04-15 with contractor contractor_inspection. Confirmation ID: CONF12345.
Inspection appointment scheduled for ticket inspection_P002_Q2 on 2025-04-18 with contractor contractor_inspection. Confirmation ID: CONF67890.
Inspection appointment scheduled for ticket inspection_P003_Q2 on 2025-04-20 with contractor contractor_inspection. Confirmation ID: CONF24680.

All three quarterly inspections have been successfully scheduled:
- Property P001: April 15, 2025 (Confirmation ID: CONF12345)
- Property P002: April 18, 2025 (Confirmation ID: CONF67890)
- Property P003: April 20, 2025 (Confirmation ID: CONF24680)
Let me know if you’d like to add reminders for the tenants or any other assistance.
